post_info.post_title: Congress Approval Rating Matches Historical Low

This is no surprise considering the clowns that are currently in the leadership in congress right now.

Yeah, they should be doing alot more to put the brakes on the worst president we've ever had. That's one of their main jobs, and to my mind they aren't doing it nearly well enough. Of course the last congress did even worse, but no one had the least expectation that they would do their duty in that regard. People had hopes with this congress, it's why they got elected, that's why their lack of progress is so disappointing.

 I agree with you Kronus, but I also think this Congress has been hampered at least in the Senate by obtuse obstructionist republicans who used to be Bush's rubber stamp. I am hoping that a number of these senators will be replaced in '08.
